goals.goal: Presentation of the automatic transcription system and its applicability in training sessions and meetings.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, it was demonstrated how the tool works in real time and how reports can be generated automatically.

goals.goal: Discuss the integration of the platform with academic institutions.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: No, the conversation was preliminary, and further discussions are planned.

goals.goal: Explain the reporting features and how they can enhance the effectiveness of training.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, various reporting features were discussed, including engagement metrics and personalized feedback for participants.

goals.goal: Explore potential collaborations with the University of Minho and other educational institutions.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: No, potential collaborations were mentioned, but no concrete agreements were made during the meeting.

goals.goal: Identify next steps for implementing the platform in training sessions.
goals.status: Objective Achieved: Yes, next steps were outlined for contacting relevant parties and preparing for future implementations.
